concept.title: Troubleshoot common exceptions for keyword-driven testing

prolog.author: Yen Nguyen <yen.nguyen@katalon.com>Here is a list of common exceptions when executing keyword-driven testing, followed by possible solutions.

conbody.p: automatically analyzes and identifies failure reasons for test execution.
Below is a list of common exceptions for each keyword, followed by possible solutions when you encounter a failed test case in keyword-driven testing.
